body: Hey guys I'm JacobMonster18 aka Jacob I used to be a very active member hanging out with friends and such it was a awesome experience until my computer broke so I've missed  Avicus Ive been here since Nebula for about a year and a half or maybe two years I can't remember but I decided to come back but I don't know how many of you guys remember me, I think some of the older players might but Im just back to say hey and have fun! And Happy Thanksgiving!
